title: TODAY at 11:15 AM Secretary Clinton to make announcement about humanitarian aid to Pakistan | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 19, 2009

 



TODAY at 11:15 AM Secretary Clinton to make announcement about humanitarian aid to Pakistan






THE WHITE HOUSE

		Office of the Press Secretary

		____________________________________________________
		FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                           May 19, 2009

MEDIA ADVISORY

		Secretary of State Hillary Clinton will make an announcement about humanitarian aid to Pakistan today at 11:15AM EDT in the Brady briefing room.

		To receive clearance into the briefing room, please email your full name, date of birth, social security number, and country of citizenship to press@who.eop.gov by 10:00AM EDT.
